notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Your content will be anonymized in 7 days for
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: All your content in this community will be anonymized and archived in 7 days, after that you will not be able to delete it or change it. See your content below.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: All your content in this group will be anonymized and archived in 7 days, after that you will not be able to delete it or change it. See your content below.

email.automaticToxicityDetection: This content has been automatically flagged as toxic using AI algorithms that estimate the toxicity of the content. You can delete the content if needed.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Sometimes the AI algorithm calculates a wrong score, in that case do not worry, you need to take no further action and can ignore this email.
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Novo mišljenje je dodato ovoj ideji
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Novo mišljenje je dodato Vašoj ideji
email.postReport: Ideja je prijavljena zbog kršenja prava
email.pointReport: Mišljenje je prijavljeno zbog kršenja prava
email.user_invite_2: Kliknite na link ili ga nalijepite mjesto za adresu pretraživača da biste prihvatili poziv
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Mišljenje je označeno kao beskorisna za moju ideju
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Mišljenje je označeno kao korisno za moju ideju
email.reset_password_1: Ovo je link za promjenu Vaše lozinke.
email.reset_password_2: Ako niste tražili ovo, molim Vas ignorišite ovaj imajl.
email.reset_password_3: Vaša lozinka neće biti promijenjena dok ne pristupite linku iznad i kreirate novu lozinku
